title: Robotics
description: Work as a a part of team CHAOS 131. Develop a robot every year to compete at competitions while also spreading STEM throughout community.

title: Oracle
description: Participate in working on the longest running literary magazine in America. Put together a small assortment of artwork, photography, and poetry twice a year.

title: DECA
description: Learn about business by picking a business related topic, learning about it, and competing through roleplaying business scenarios and completing an exam.

title: Tri-M
description: Spread music throughout the community and participate in events aroundn the music department.

title: Key Club
description: Help out around your commmunity with many different service opportunities.

title: Story Tellers Club
description: Create and share storys of all kinds with different people.
